title: Quantum Auto-Encoder
subtitle: Quantum Auto-Encoder: encoder network
description: A Quantum Machine Learning (QML) example in which a quantum program is trained to reduce the memory required to encode data with a given structure. In addition, the example demonstrates how to use the encoder for anomaly detection. Two training approaches for the quantum autoencoder are presented, leveraging Classiqâ€™s integration with PyTorch. This example also illustrates the use of the RESET operation.
